casebody.data:
MADGE
v.
SAVANNAH-CHATHAM COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT et al. No. S15A1076. Supreme Court of Georgia. June 15, 2015. Maurice Luther King, Jr., The Law Offices of Maurice Luther King, Jr., Albany, for appellant. Leamon R. Holliday, III, Andrew H. Dekle, Bouhan Falligant LLP, Savannah, for appellee.

Opinion

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed without opinion pursuant to Supreme Court Rule 59.

Affirmed without opinion.

All the Justices concur.
